name: Famine
description:
This is a short platformer game our team of 2 programmers and 2 designers created with the goal of learning and progressing our skills.

It is about a boy, Bob, who sets out to a magical haunted forest in search of food for his starving village.

The game is designed for an arcade machine, therefore, there are only 3 levels, and 1 end level, no checkpoints and no save file.
